content.text:
# 1867 Orange colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Orange on 3 July 1867 because William Forlonge was insolvent and resigned his seat.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 12 June 1867
| William Forlonge declared insolvent, and resigned.
|-
| 12 February 1867
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 1 July 1867
| Nominations
|-
| 3 July 1867
| Polling day
|-
| 10 July 1867
| Return of writ
|}
Results
}}
}}
|votes		=	238
|percentage	=	37.5
}}
William Forlonge was insolvent and resigned.
